function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Authors in close contact during manuscript drafting","Impact":"Risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation measures and reduce in-person meetings","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, video conferencing tools","People":"Authors, research team","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Collection and reanalysis of clinical data by multiple authors","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Limit physical interaction and implement remote data analysis","Technologies":"Remote data analysis software, secure data sharing platforms","People":"Authors, research team","Owner":"Research team"}]}
